author: GameSpot
description:
Check out the Fortnite crossover with the Simpsons coming today 11/1. We got a glimpse of the gameplay trailer for the season as well as a short Simpsons segment leading into the Simpsons Island! Check out what Homer does with the shard!

#simpsons #fortnite
title: Fortnite X Simpsons Full Event Introduction Gameplay
